org.finra.herd.service.impl

Class TagServiceImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.finra.herd.service.impl.TagServiceImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SearchableService, TagService

    @Service
 @Transactional(value="herdTransactionManager")
public class TagServiceImpl
extends Object
implements TagService, SearchableService
    The tag service implementation.

      • getTags

        public TagListResponse getTags(String tagTypeCode,
                               String tagCode)
        Description copied from interface: TagService
        Retrieves all associated tags for the specified tag type code.

        When tagCode is null, return all tags of the tag type code.

        When tagCode is provided, return all tags of the tag type code and whose parent tag code is tagCode.

        Specified by:
        getTags in interface TagService
        Parameters:
        tagTypeCode - the tag type's code.
        tagCode - the tag code.
        Returns:
        all associated tags, with parent, itself and the children tags with has more children flag.

      • getValidSearchResponseFields

        Returns:

      • searchTags

        public TagSearchResponse searchTags(TagSearchRequest request,
                                    Set<String> fields)
        Description copied from interface: TagService
        Retrieves all tags existing in the system per specified search filters and keys. For each tag entity, this endpoint returns tag key by default along with any other top-level elements as specified by the "fields" query string parameter. The list of tags returned by this endpoint is sorted alphabetically by tag's display name ascending.
        Specified by:
        searchTags in interface TagService
        Parameters:
        request - the tag search request. The request can only accept at most one search filter and a single search key
        fields - the field options for the tag type search response
        Returns:
        the tag search response
